title: Fragment, 1950–60
medium:
Medium: cotton (?)
Technique: plain weave with supplementary warp
description: Wide green band patterned by green and blue rectangles formed by floats. Sewn to both sides is a three-quarter inch tape: green on one side and blue on the other.
